problem.markdown:
1. Response spectrum is the plot between time period and maximum displacement of building to a given ground motion. (x) True () False
2) Time period controls maximum response. (x) True b) False
3) Buildings of different size, shapes will always have different time periods. () True (x) False
4) Spectrum values are independent of damping. () True (x) False
5) Response spectrum is very useful for structural engineers in design. (x) True () False
problem.p: 1. Response spectrum is the plot between time period and maximum displacement of building to a given ground motion.
3) Buildings of different size, shapes will always have different time periods.
4) Spectrum values are independent of damping.
5) Response spectrum is very useful for structural engineers in design.
